title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.1 - Parking in ogs parking facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-1.1 - Parking in ogs parking facilities

State Regulations

Any State employee desiring to park in an OGS parking
facility in the Albany area must register for such privilege with their agency
employer and/or the OGS Bureau of Parking Services. Those State employees
outside of the Albany area should contact the OGS building superintendent or
the equivalent. A registered State employee must conspicuously display his or
her valid permit, tag, and/or decal in the vehicle as directed by the issuing
office. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
296-1.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
